entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 7.
